dataSet.name: DataSet1
dataSet.query: SELECT ALLOWED SalesTurnovers.Recorder AS Recorder, SalesTurnovers.SecondPeriod, SalesTurnovers.MinutePeriod, SalesTurnovers.HourPeriod, SalesTurnovers.DayPeriod, SalesTurnovers.WeekPeriod, SalesTurnovers.TenDaysPeriod, SalesTurnovers.MonthPeriod, SalesTurnovers.QuarterPeriod, SalesTurnovers.HalfYearPeriod, SalesTurnovers.YearPeriod, SalesTurnovers.ProductsAndServices, SalesTurnovers.Characteristic, SalesTurnovers.Batch, SalesTurnovers.Document, SalesTurnovers.VATRate, SalesTurnovers.Company, SalesTurnovers.CustomerOrder, SalesTurnovers.Document.Counterparty AS Counterparty, CASE WHEN SalesTurnovers.Document REFS Document.ExpenseReport THEN VALUE(Catalog.StructuralUnits.EmptyRef) WHEN SalesTurnovers.Document REFS Document.CustomerOrder THEN SalesTurnovers.Document.SalesStructuralUnit ELSE SalesTurnovers.Document.Division END AS Division, CASE WHEN SalesTurnovers.Document REFS Document.CustomerOrder THEN SalesTurnovers.Document.StructuralUnitReserve ELSE SalesTurnovers.Document.StructuralUnit END AS Warehouse, SalesTurnovers.ProductsAndServices.MeasurementUnit, SalesTurnovers.Responsible AS Responsible, SalesTurnovers.QuantityTurnover AS Quantity, SalesTurnovers.AmountTurnover AS Amount, SalesTurnovers.VATAmountTurnover AS VATAmount, SalesTurnovers.CostTurnover AS Cost, SalesTurnovers.ProductsAndServices.ProductsAndServicesCategory AS ProductsAndServicesCategory FROM AccumulationRegister.Sales.Turnovers(, , Auto, ) AS SalesTurnovers

calculatedField.expression: CASE WHEN IsNull(Amount, 0) <> 0 THEN Amount - IsNull(Cost, 0) / Amount ELSE 0 END * 100

totalField.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(Amount) <> 0 THEN (SUM(Amount)- SUM(Cost) ) * 100 / SUM(Amount) ELSE "-" END

parameter.dcsat:name: DynamicPeriod
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN &Periodicity = VALUE(Enum.Periodicity.Day) THEN Format(DynamicPeriod, "DF=dd.MM.yy") WHEN &Periodicity = VALUE(Enum.Periodicity.Week) THEN Format(DynamicPeriod, "DF=dd.MM.yy") WHEN &Periodicity = VALUE(Enum.Periodicity.TenDays) THEN Format(DynamicPeriod, "DF=dd.MM.yy") WHEN &Periodicity = VALUE(Enum.Periodicity.Month) THEN Format(DynamicPeriod, "DF = 'MMM yy'") WHEN &Periodicity = VALUE(Enum.Periodicity.Quarter) THEN Format(DynamicPeriod, "DF = 'q ""app."" yy'") WHEN &Periodicity = VALUE(Enum.Periodicity.HalfYear) THEN Format(DynamicPeriod, "DF = 'MM.yy'") WHEN &Periodicity = VALUE(Enum.Periodicity.Year) THEN Format(DynamicPeriod, "DF = 'yyyy'") END
